alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 8:20PM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Jackson affecting Rankin and Hinds Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Madison and Rankin Counties. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Jackson. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Water backs up into several creeks and streams in the Jackson area. Water is under some homes near the river in the Byram area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Sunday the stage was 28.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 30.0 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Jackson 28.0 28.9 Sun 7 pm CST 28.9 28.8 29.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
